00068 
00069     virtual void start()
00070     {
00071         dbg_printf("ThreadIrix::start()\n");
00072         assert(sys::SyncFactoryIrix().startThread(*this));
00073     }
00074 
00075     virtual bool kill()
00076     {
00077         dbg_printf("ThreadIrix::kill()\n");
00078         return sys::SyncFactoryIrix().killThread(*this);
00079     }
00080 
00081     static void __start(void *v)
00082     {
00083         EVAL(v);
00084         dbg_printf("ThreadIrix::__start()\n");
00085         sys::ThreadIrix *me = (sys::ThreadIrix *)v;
00086         me->target()->run();
00087         if (me != me->target())
00088         {
00089             delete me->target();
00090         }
00091         dbg_printf("ThreadIrix::__start() has completed\n");
00092         exit(EXIT_SUCCESS);
00093     }
00094

00100     /*   return true; */
00101     /*      } */
00102     /*      return false; */
00103     //}
00104     virtual bool join();
